short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor memory use, displayed as percent in use in colored extension icon.  Based on pd4d10's Memory Monitor extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Memory Usage Percent Monitor, modified by Mike Young
Based on Memory Monitor, created by pd4d10

This Chrome extension adds an icon to extension bar area to monitor memory use, displayed as a percent of memory in use, with colored background from green, to yellow, to red, as memory gets used.
